summary: EUR card acquiring (MK 1127) processed 7.8M EUR with 386,899 EUR total commission. Acquiring contract not provided. Only Smartflow ToB documents ghost rates. The 1.75% base commission (323,083 EUR) has no contract backing.

notes.text: No acquiring contract provided for EUR card channel (MK 1127). The 1.75% base commission rate has no contract document backing.
Ghost mechanic: from Mar 12, total commission splits into base (col C, Paymentz) + ghost (col M, Impaya). Ghost rates are documented in Smartflow ToB.
Registry and reconciliation amounts match exactly across all months.
Rate timeline: 5.0% total (Jan 1 – Mar 18), 4.8% total (Mar 19 – Apr 9). Ghost split begins Mar 12.
Sub-merchant ID: MK 1127. Channel active Sep 30, 2024 through Apr 9, 2025.
